mapper.select: SELECT mi.mate_inbo_cd, mi.mcode, mi.mate_ver_cd, mi.wcode, mi.ware_ver_cd, mi.purc_d_cd, mi.lot_no, mi.supplier_lot_no, mi.inbo_dt, mi.inbo_status, mi.total_qty, mi.mname, mi.note, mi.cp_cd, mi.deli_dt, pod.ex_deli_dt, pod.purc_qty, pod.unit, pod.unit_price FROM mate_inbo mi LEFT JOIN purc_ord_d pod ON mi.purc_d_cd = pod.purc_d_cd ORDER BY mi.inbo_dt DESC
